title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.13 - Education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.13 - Education

State Regulations

Child care agencies: (a) shall take such steps as may be necessary
to make certain that all children in care receive education appropriate to
their needs and in accordance with the requirements of the Education

Law; (b) shall maintain an active
and direct liaison with any school in which a child in its care is
enrolled; (c) shall make certain
that each child in its care receives appropriate educational and vocational
guidance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
441.13

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
